runs.comm: doesn't bother with a sighter as he attacks this fuller length outside of off with a slice over to third man, with this reaching him after a couple of bounces
in the slot and driven competently by MacLeod through extra-cover, as this just gained momentum after he merely pushed at the delivery
length delivery outside of off which is treated with the utmost respect

burst of sun breaks through as he offers up a length delivery slanting on the pads which is eased away with a drive through long on. Looked casual as he struck this, but the pitch did the rest of the work
gets a lovely away swinging delivery on a fuller length outside of off stump. Allowed to breeze through to the keeper
remains watchful outside his off stump to see out this bumper opening over for Scotland
given plenty of flight as he delivers this, with the ball in the air as he defended to the leg side. Manage to run a single as the ball rolls through mid-on
given plenty of air as this is struck away to the off side by the batsman
darts in a quicker one along a similar angle as this is handled competently by MacLeod
defended from within the confines of his crease
gives the charge somewhat before offering a tentative clip through the leg side
defended from the crease as he reaches out to this one sliding in on middle and leg
slants down the leg side on a shortish length as this is glanced away by the batsman

and Mortaza gets a worthy reward as he nips out Calum with this length delivery that catches the leading edge of his bat as he looked to nudge it away to the leg side. Ends up popping over to the fielder inside the ring at cover for a straightforward catch
full delivery on middle and off which is clipped away through mid-on
back of a length and defended towards the off side by Gardiner
glances away this back of a length rolling onto the pads, with the ball ending up near deep fine leg
hangs on the back foot to keep out this back of a length angling in from outside off
whisked away off the pads behind of square as this arrived so slowly to him
another flighted beauty, outside of off, which is diffused of any malice
shuffles in his crease before resorting to the back foot to work away this one drifting in on middle and leg
another flighted wonder which takes an eternity to come as he defends back to the bowler
drags the length onto the pads as he clears his front leg to short-arm pull this over to deep midwicket
whipped away off the back foot through midwicket to keep the strike
is late on this short of a length which clatters into his thigh guard
short of a length and worked away to the leg side by the batsman
looks to drive this away off the back foot through extra-cover, but silly mid-off is having none of it
whisked away at the top of the bounce behind of square to pickup a brace
tries to cut through cover point now, but doesn't quite time it away off the blade
delivers a fuller length outside of off which Gardiner has a drive at as the ball just nibbles away on the way to the keeper
darts a quicker one in which strikes the pads, but going down, as Gardiner is late on it
tries to nurdle a single through the leg side, but is thwarted by the close-in field
did not look at all confident with this attempted paddle sweep, looking to go initially through backward square
finally succeeds in getting a single on the leg side to bring Coetzer on strike
driven rather tentatively towards the fielder at cover
clipped away to the leg side to bring the over to an end
length delivery on middle and off which he gets a slight inside-edge to as he played at it
short of a length, just outside of off, as this is fended away by the batsman
tries to carve away some runs through the covers, but is stopped by the fielder on the ring
guilty of bowling a bit too short as Gardiner rocks back to pull this authoritatively through midwicket for a boundary
seemed to put a lot more force behind this fuller one outside off, as this shapes away naturally upon pitching
employs a traditional front foot defense to see out this fuller delivery angling in outside off
begins with a fuller length outside of off which is dabbed away square to third man
keeps out this fuller one barreling in on off stump
gets appreciable movement into the batsman, and consequently, down the leg side as this is worked away with the angle through backward square
has a push at this fullish length outside his off peg, with the short mid-off fielder getting his body soundly behind the ball
sharp bouncer just outside off which cramps Coetzer for space as he lets go of one hand from the handle as he glided this away through third man
pacey delivery on the pads which Mushfiqur has to stretch fully to his left to get a paw on. Ends up doing the deed, saving Bangladesh a potential leg-side boundary. His father would be proud
length delivery which is negotiated with ease by Gardiner
shortish length which shapes away as the batsman defended at the top of the bounce
short from Rubel and Hamish is able to pull this easily through midwicket to find yet another boundary
looks to nail one through the covers, but doesn't quite get it away as such

straying down the pads on a fullish length as Hamish, who just manages to get an edge on this as he went for the flick, is able to pickup a boundary through fine leg after Mushfiqur fails to take the chance from behind. His father will not be so proud.
keeps out this fuller delivery on and around off to see out his first over
punched away through the covers, but is stopped by a fine, diving save. This one by Sarkar, who does well to get low to his right
has a waft at this back of a length outside off, with the ball doing just enough to flash by the moving blade
short of a length delivery into the ribs which is glanced away fine behind of square
decides to let this short of a length outside of off sail through to Mushfiqur

Taskin exults in pure joy as he succeeds in getting Gardiner to slash at this back of a length outside of off, with this landing straight to the man at cover, who is able to take it on the second attempt after bobbling the initial take
short of a length which climbs at an awkward height as he fends this away behind of square through long leg
defended away to the leg side by the batsman
another one which is fended away leg-side
flights one in on middle and leg which is defended from the crease
comes down the track before heaving Mahmudullah high over cow corner for a smooth six into the stands. Just effortless as this sailed away
punches the bowler through the covers now in hopes of piercing the gap
defends this one drifted in back to the bowler in his follow through
driven away off the back foot to this one shaping in from outside off. Stopped by the mid-on fielder
whips away this back of a length honing on the pads behind to deep fine leg
strikes the pads but it looks like this may have pitched outside of leg as Mashrafe comes up to flirt with the prospect of getting this one reviewed
defends this shortish length back towards the bowler, but with soft hands
slanting down the pads as this is whipped away to square-leg
overpitched just outside of off, but nailed straight to the short mid-off fielder
goes round the wicket as he lobs up one on middle and leg which is dispatched to the man at deep midwicket
drifts onto the pads as this is nudged away through the leg side
eased away to the close-in fielder on the leg side as he stays within the crease

short now as he picks his spot at backward square to pummel this one slipping away down leg. Bruce Oxenford, who turned 55 today, is lucky that he will live to see his 56th after almost getting decapitated with that blow
picks up a single through deep square-leg, with the leg umpire twitching as he sees another flash of white coming his way
worked away to the leg side to end a rather eventful over, but not for the batsmen or bowler really. Someone check on Oxenford's ticker?
full delivery slanting down leg and signalled wide as Kyle fails to get any bat on it
short of a length outside of off which is cut away to deep point
short delivery which is hooked away through backward square to find the boundary in a hurry
short of length on off. Machan punches it back to the bowler
angled across the left-hander. Machan steers it to third man with an angled bat
drops another shortish length, this time heading down the leg side, as he just about gets bat on bat to tickle this past Mushfiqur to the fine leg boundary
poor delivery to end the over. Taskin errs in line, drifts onto the pads, Coetzer tickles it fine and beats a desperate dive from Rahim behind the stumps
eased away through long on for a comfortable single
flighted on middle as this is nurdled back towards the bowler
fails to whip away this delivery on the leg stump
defended away towards long on for another single
steers this one drifting in down to the man at long on
flighted on middle and off as Machan advances a few steps before defending away to the leg side
full delivery outside of off which Kyle looks to give the beans, but is late on as this continues behind to the keeper
a touch closer on a similar length now as this is caressed away to the extra-cover fielder
elegant from Machan as he gets a half-volley outside off before unfurling a corker of a drive to find the extra-cover boundary in a flash
defended from the crease to this back of a length from Rubel
pushes at this fuller one angling in from leg, as this is worked down to mid-off
short from Rubel and pulled away through midwicket for a couple
continues from round the wicket as this flighted delivery is struck back to him in his follow through
this time is able to guide it past the bowler to long off
punched away to the man on the ring at mid-off
driven off the back foot, but straight to the bowler
this time glances the bowler through square leg, but the close-in fielder on that side quickly dissuades the notion of a quick single
comes down the track before being intercepted by Nasir at short mid-on, who pounces on to it
defended away on the front foot to this one drifting in
able to sweep the bowler square off the wicket on the leg side for one
cuts away this slightly short delivery outside of off, but some really excellent fielding, from Nasir again, at extra-cover is able to stop this
looks to go for the reverse now but is struck on and around leg, with the trajectory suggesting it would continue down that angle
defended away to the leg side by the batsman
once more tries to reverse sweep as he is slightly late on this one, before having to recover and knock away the ball after seeing it fall dangerously close to the base of his stumps
gets a fortunate boundary through third man as this short of a length catches the outside of his bat as he looked to punch through the covers
goes after this short of a length outside off, but is late on it
fuller delivery which is driven straight to short mid-off
looking to force one away through the covers, but ends up mishitting more towards mid-on
fuller delivery on the pads which is whipped away through to deep midwicket
dabs this just back of a length delivery down to third man to end the over
advances a touch before guiding this Shakib delivery down to long on
waits on this floated delivery outside off before heaving it over deep midwicket for a boundary. Well calculated risk that comes off to a tee
given plenty of air outside of off as Coetzer tries to club this away through the covers
Shakib succeeds in getting Coetzer to attack this flighted delivery, as he chips at this one uppishly between the midwicket and mid-on fielders to find the cow corner boundary
gets a nice stride in before smothering for the spin
tries to nurdle a single down the leg side, but is held by the close-in fielder
slow bouncer which Bangladesh go up for thinking Machan may have feathered an edge as he tried to remove his bat from the equation. Called a wide in the end
gets away with this uppish clip through backward square, with this falling safe in the end
carves away a single with a slap through the covers
short of a length which he fails to run down through third man
safely negotiates this fuller length going across
fullish length which is driven away through extra-cover for a couple, but they really should have made this three
driven straight to mid-off to end the over
gets on one knee before sweeping powerfully to deep backward square. That also raises their 100, with polite applause, and bagpipes, going off at the ground
clips away this fuller one on the pads through midwicket
punched away through the covers, but short mid-off is like "oh, hell no"
this time eased away through long on for one
tries to force one away through the leg side, but picks out the close-in fielder
driven firmly down to long on to end another good over for Scotland as they tick on through
fuller delivery which is driven down to long off
carves away a single through cover to get Coetzer on strike
short delivery outside of off which just sits up for Coetzer as he pulls this authoritatively through cow corner to get four more
slaps away this length delivery to sweeper cover to get to the other end
goes for the drop single outside his off stump, which he executes with aplomb
gets an inside edge to this attempted clip through midwicket, with some initial interest from the Bangladeshi ranks
able to get away a clip through to deep midwicket as he returns for the second
another push off the pads down to the man in the deep, this time for one
given plenty of rip as this is glided down through third man
this time whipped away off the back foot down to long on
tossed up as this is lasered down to deep extra-cover, with some nifty footwork on the boundary edge keeping this to under four
and the leggie has proven trumps for Mashrafe as he claims his first ODI wicket after Machan ends up playing this one straight back to the bowler in his follow through, who takes a simple chance
safely negotiates this length delivery outside off, even getting a run out of it after seeing the lax approach from the close-in fielders
fuller length which is fended away by the Scottish captain
length delivery which shapes in as he remains resolute outside off stump
opts for the late cut behind backward point to find the fielder in the deep at third man
whips away this back of a length through mid-on, but not anywhere where a run can be earned

goes for the aerial slice through third man as this flies past backward point. Looks like it will be picked up by third man in the deep, but he ends up making a hash of it to allow it through for four. Earns Coetzer his fifty
flighted outside of off as this is drilled straight to point
defended by the batsman to the off side
pokes at this one drifting in on middle and leg, stealing a single as he pushed it away to the off side
given air outside of off as this is lasered straight to long off
guides this one past the bowler to find long on
turned away off the pads towards mid-on to end the over
looks to attack this short of a length but is late on it as he went with the pull
back of a length outside off which shapes away as he has another flash
almost a carbon copy of the previous delivery, with this perhaps a touch wider from the batsman
short of a length which is pushed away towards the off side for a quick single
driven away now through backward point to get to the other end
drives this fuller one back to the bowler in his follow through
clatters this dragged length from Sabbir through extra-cover to pickup a boundary
steered to the right of the bowler as he picks up a single through long on
advances down the track before blitzing this straight to long on. Doesn't prevent them from eking out a single in the process
driven inside-out through long off as they settle for just the one
forced away through the covers for a rather straightforward single
finishes with a single through long off
full delivery which is far too fast for Coetzer as he tried to angle this away through third man
in the slot but all Coetzer can do is caress this straight to short cover
back of a length and sits up for Coetzer as he belts this through the line to get away a boundary through cow corner
driven away on the front foot towards the off side
forces away a bludgeon through long off which lands to the fielder in the deep after a couple of bounces
tucks away this back of a length slanting on the pads
greets Taskin with a slap to this back of a length delivery through extra-cover as this races away to the boundary
slices away the bowler aerially to a squarish third man
drifting on the pads now as this is flicked behind to deep fine leg
slower delivery, outside of off, which is picked early as he laces this through the covers to the man in the deep
slower delivery outside of off which is handled with ease by the batsman
short of a length, just outside off, as he ramps this over third man to find a useful boundary to end the over
eases away the single to the leg side for one
fetches this one drifting on middle and off and paddles it over fine leg to pick the gap, with the fielder at short backward square doing well to stop this before the boundary
drags this one on leg stump, but misses out as he hammers this one away straight to deep square-leg
another loose delivery down the leg side which Coetzer is able to manipulate away through long leg as he changes his stance to pull this away in that general direction
this time tries to force it past the bowler, but is stopped in his tracks

another poor delivery from Mahmudullah as Mommsen pulls this one hard to long leg, with the fielder doing well to dive to get to this, but he may have dislocated his right shoulder in the process as he looks to be in a world of pain at the moment. The physio is rushing to his side as he goes down in agony
driven back to the bowler in his follow through
a touch short as this one is drilled straight to mid-off

leg-side slanting delivery which is helped with the angle as he deposits this one past backward square to the boundary. Moves him to the top of Scotland's all-time individual score list in World Cups. Passed Gavin Hamilton's effort of 76 from 1999
quicker delivery on off, Coetzer pushes it back to the bowler
flighted delivery from Rahman, Coetzer defends it
tossed up outside off, Coetzer drives it to long off and he will keep the strike
fuller delivery outside of off which is driven to the man at cover
blazes away a drive on the up through the covers to find four runs
slower bouncer which Coetzer was looking to hammer through midwicket, before readjusting at the last moment to whack this down past backward point
looks to go aerially over the covers but ends up slicing away to third man, with the fielder doing enough to get on to this
low, full toss just outside off which is drilled straight to the bowler in his follow through
slower delivery which is helped down to deep fine leg
gets nicely behind the line to cover for any turn
looks to force the issue through the covers, but doesn't quite time it away
this time is able to get away with the drive square off the wicket, as point's fumble allows them through in the end
waltzes down before working this away to long on
tries to pick the gap through mid-on, but is thwarted in his attempt
whipped away off the pads down to deep midwicket to keep the strike
just fends this one floated in from outside off towards the man at cover
this time driven away through towards cover, with a run on offer with all the space, but they elect not to take it
this time works away a single down the leg side
safely negotiated by Mommsen off the back foot as he tried to force the issue
defended by the batsman to the right of Nasir in his follow through
eased away a run through square-leg to keep the strike
dabs away this length delivery outside of off to third man
slaps away a single square off the wicket with no issue
clears the cow corner boundary with ease as he heaves Mashrafe, who ends up bowling a no ball, over the area with comfortable ease
is unable to do justice to this fuller one as he slices inside-out over the cover region
lovely lofted stroke, now over extra-cover, as Coetzer gets into the act, moving him to 94 in the process. Will be looked upon as the anchor while Mommsen looks to blast around him
laces this fuller length straight to the extra-cover fielder on the ring
fails to get away this back foot punch past the bowler, who is able to stop this in his bowling stride
floated on off as this is drilled straight to deep extra-cover
helps this one slipping down the leg side through fine leg as the pair are restricted to just the two
defended from the relative safety of his crease
looking to go through the covers but ends up hitting it a lot straighter to Shakib
once again succeeds in finding the bowler in his follow through
this time attacks through long off to pickup a single
clubs away this back of a length through long off, but can't eke out the single
is late on this back of a length outside of off which sails through comfortably to Mushfiqur
has a another wild swing to this length delivery outside his off stump

fetches this length delivery outside of off before slamming this high over long on to bring up Scotland's first World Cup century. Outstanding way to get to a treasured landmark. Yet another significant victory for the Associates as they continue to make a strong case at this World Cup
stand and deliver as he pummels this fuller one in the general direction of long on
once again targets the long on area, timing away a drive which is intercepted by the mid-on fielder
goes down a touch before chipping this one in the direction of long off
eased away through the same region as they rotate the strike
fetches this one outside of off before sweeping away powerfully through midwicket
able to dig out this quicker one darted in on leg
uses his feet well to chip this one down to long on for one
picks up a single through long off now to keep the strike
just stands his ground before drilling this fuller delivery outside off through the covers
slightly full again and punished by Coetzer as he goes aerial through long off now to find four more
tries to pickup this fuller length on the pads but is late on it
picks up a brace with a swat down the ground
crunch! Coetzer sends this fuller delivery high over long off as another half a dozen is signalled by the umpire
ducks under this shorter one from Rubel, which is deemed wide by the square-leg umpire
now works away a single through long off to keep the strike and end a successful Powerplay for Scotland, one in which they gained 50 runs
safely negotiates this flighted delivery on middle and off
floated up on middle and leg as this is clipped towards mid-on
driven on the up through long off to get to the other end
glances away this leg-side delivery as they hustle the first one to come back just in the nick of time for the second, despite being under pressure from the throw at midwicket
pushes out at this one drifting in, finding some space near mid-off
turned away towards mid-on as they scamper a quick single, which they complete despite a shy at the non-striker's
dishes a low, full toss which he is lucky to get away with as this is struck firmly to the cover fielder
full outside of off as he just about gets away a slice through the region to pickup four runs
picks his spot at long off, and fulfills it with a slap to this full toss which arrives just about waist-height
full, and just wide of a groping Coetzer as he looked to throw the kitchen sink at it
waits and waits before distintegrating the leather of this one, getting this high over long on for a huge six. Coetzer moves to 140 now. Outstanding stuff!
fires in a yorker on leg which is dug out in the end by Coetzer as he angles it away through midwicket. Also gets Scotland to 250 as well, much to the delight of the Saxton faithful
just flicks away this one darted in on the pads, just in front of square on the leg side
turns away this one flighted in on middle and off, as a misfield at mid-on allows them some extra runs
this time nudged away to square-leg, as they hustle through the first to come back in time for the second
floated up on off as this is eased down to long off

Mommsen, looking to up the ante with a boundary hit near the end of the over, but ends up holing out at deep midwicket once the man at cow corner comes forward to claim the catch. Didn't quite get this away off the bat, but he has played a superb hand to lend support to this Coetzer classic
able to keep the strike as he tucks away a single through midwicket
moves to 150 with this slap down to long off. This is the first time an Associate batsman has scored 150 in a World Cup game
flat-bats this one darted in outside off to get the man back on strike
Coetzer continues to motor along as he paddle-sweeps this leg-side delivery over to the square-leg boundary
this time quicker in the air as this is defended away to the off side

comes down a touch to try and force away a drive through the covers. Berrington wants the run so Coetzer takes the lead, with the bowler having to do a turn to fire in a throw after picking up the ball, but misses the non-striker's stumps
Berrington now eases away a single down to long on to finish the over
sweeps away this one flighted in on middle and leg, getting this down to deep backward square in the end
another leg-side delivery which is helped with the angle, but is stopped by short backward square
backs away to the leg side before clubbing this shorter length over to deep square-leg

and Coetzer's day out at the Saxton comes to a close as he attempts yet another heave over cow corner, but falls short of the mark as this lands at deep midwicket for a straightforward take. Exits the oval to very generous applause as he has put together the innings of his life to give Scotland a serious shot at winning this match
gets away a powerful sweep through backward square as the pair settle for just the one
ends up hitting this one back to the bowler in his follow through

poor running from these two, it was a short delivery from Rahman, Berrington hangs back and pulls it behind square, the fielder from deep square leg runs to his right, slides and saves three for his team
gets away a single square off the wicket now
wonderful sound as he connected with this wristy flick over midwicket, with this sailing high and handsome onto the roof!
clatters away a single through the covers, much to the relief of Sabbir whose head must still be spinning after that last strike
able to squirt away a brace through to deep extra-cover, with a diving save near the boundary edge cutting off any extra runs

was looking to get away a blow over midwicket, but ends up hitting it more towards long leg after swiveling more than he would have liked. Is cut off in the end, but just mere inches from the boundary rope
almost succeeds in bowling himself as he fails at this reverse sweep, with the ball just rushing past the off stump
monstrous hit from Berrington, now over extra-cover, as he backed away a touch before slicing this high and mighty over the region. Berrington looking to play a blinder here in Nelson
backs away to the leg side before directing away this one which follows him to the man at deep midwicket
now looks to scythe through the covers, but is stopped by the fielder inside of the ring
once again creates room before slapping away this shorter length from Nasir through extra-cover, with this having just enough on it to beat the boot of long off who was coming round to field it
needles away a single down to long on to end the over
dishes up a wide full toss which is slapped straight to extra-cover at a rate of knots
fetches this full toss outside of off and deposits it high over long leg with a wristy flick to get Scotland past 300
given plenty of air as Cross is late on the cross-batted swat through long on
flighted up, on a fuller length, as Cross is unable to get this away
bit quicker now as Cross bludgeons through the off side, running hard to get Berrington back on the Hot Seat
slows down the pace of this one outside off as Berrington is far too early into the sweep through midwicket

dropped this attempted heave over long on just falls short of the fielder as he ran full tilt to try and get at this one which was dying quickly on him, but ends up bobbling the chance once he went to ground
slow, wide delivery outside of off which Berrington initially looked to attack, before letting it through in hopes of the delivery getting penalised

slams this low full toss straight at the non-striker's left hand, who drops the bat, which was in that hand. Looks to be in some trouble as that was a stinger of a blow. That really had to hurt as he gave that one plenty of welly.

slower, full delivery outside of off which Berrington ends up mishitting high in the air as the bat turned in his hands. Mushfiqur, running back and to his left, is able in the end to complete the chance after the ball swirled in the dying moments. Mushfiqur's father, who is still out there in the stands I am sure, would be proud
reaches out to this widish, full delivery, but because his stance was so off-side, he is not penalised by the umpire

goes for the big tonk through long off, but ends up giving up a thick outside edge which flies dangerously close to the outstretched glove of Mushfiqur, who is unable to get to it. His father, would not be so proud
slower ball outside off which is slapped straight to cover point, who takes it at head height quite comfortably. Taskin has come back really well for Bangladesh here in this over
driven with ease down to long off
able to tuck away this one on middle and leg to the leg side
carves out a single to this one floated in outside off
backs away a whole lot before driving this to the close-in fielder on the off side

unbelievable catch in the deep at square-leg as Haq looks for quick runs over midwicket, but Soumya, who has already taken a couple today, comes forward before putting in a fine, forward dive to pluck this just inches from the ground. Fantastic catch, but far too late in the grand scheme of things
looks for the reverse sweep to this one flighted in outside off, but is late on it. Doesn't really matter though as it is called wide in the end

some great hustle from both these batsmen are able to take Scotland to a rather imposing 318 for 8. Works this one away through long off, running the first one hard in order to come back in time of the throw for the second
